com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core

Class JobManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core.JobManager

  • public class JobManager
extends java.lang.Object
    JobManager provides context for jobs to run in.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobManager

        public JobManager()
        Constructor, same as JobManager(null)

      • JobManager

        public JobManager(Persistor persistor)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        persistor - implementation of the Persistor interface for persisting jobs across instances. May be null, which means jobs do not persist.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        public <T> JobObserver<T> submit(Job<T> job)
        Submit a Job for processing.
        Parameters:
        job - The Job to submit
        Returns:
        a JobObserver for the submitted job
        Throws:
        Dependable.DependencyException - The submitted job contains an invalid dependency
        Dependable.DependencyCycleException - Submitting this job would create a dependency cycle

      • getJobs

        public java.util.List<Job<?>> getJobs()
        Returns:
        A shallow-copy snapshot of the current list of jobs in ascending order by start time

      • getJob

        public Job getJob(DependableId jobId)
        Retrieve a Job based on id.
        Parameters:
        jobId -
        Returns:
        The Job itself, or null.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all jobs from the JobManager. Also calls clear() on the supplied Persistor, if any

        public Dependable getDependable(DependableId dependedId)
